blogPost.excerpt: MultiVersial is a daily newsletter with the latest in tech business in Spanish. Languages are still a barrier to accessing knowledge. A fun and simple newsletter that allows you to stay up to date, understand tech strategy, and grow professionally in 5 mins

previous.excerpt: We’re building Opal for anyone who’s primary connection to their job – their team, their employees, their customers – is through video calls. We want to make it easy for everyone to have a professional setup, with a single plug and play system.
